item.title: Apple crisp oats
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup of rolled oats 1 cup of water 2 tbsp of plant-based milk 2 tbsp of brown sugar half an apple or 2 tbsp of applesauce 1/2 tsp of plant-based butter (if using apples) small handful of granola 1/2 tsp cinnamon 1/4 tsp cloves 1/4 tsp nutmeg Steps If using apples, cut half an apple in small squares and put in a pan with 1/2 tsp of plant-based butter, cook until sligthly browned.

item.title: Winter oats
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup of steel-cut oats 1 cup of water 2 tbsp of plant-based milk 2 tbsp of brown sugar 2 tbsp of dried cranberries 1/4 tsp of vanilla 6 - 8 entire pecans 1/4 tsp cinnamon 1/4 tsp cardamom 1/4 tsp cloves 1/4 tsp nutmeg Steps In a small pot combine 1/2 cup of steel-cut oats and 1 cup of water Cook on medium/high until it boils, around 7 min while stirring.

item.title: Savory miso oats
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup of steel-cut oats 1 cup of water olive oil 1 seitan sausage 1 tsp brown miso 1 tsp soy sauce 1/2 tsp thyme 1 tbsp nutritional yeast 1 green onion Steps cut the seitan sausage in slices and chop the green onion In a pan, put a little olive oil and the sausages slices and cook on medium high until browned, around 5 min At the same time, combine in a small pot 1/2 cup of steel-cut oats and 1 cup of water Cook on medium/high until it boils, around 7 min while stirring.

item.title: Fall oats
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup of steel-cut oats 1 cup of water 2 tbsp of plant-based milk 2 tbsp of brown sugar pumpkin pur√©e dark chocolate chips pumpkin seeds 1/2 tsp cinnamon 1/4 tsp powdered ginger 1/4 tsp nutmeg Steps In a small pot combine 1/2 cup of steel-cut oats and 1 cup of water Cook on medium/high until it boils, around 7 min while stirring. Turn of the heat and add 2 tbsp of plant-based milk, mix well.
